org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.api

Interface GraphHeadHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ElementHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HBaseGraphHeadHandler

    public interface GraphHeadHandler
extends ElementHandler
    This class is responsible for reading and writing EPGM graph heads from and to HBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GraphHeadHandler applyQuery(ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMGraphHead>> query)
      Applies the given ElementQuery to the handler.
      ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMGraphHead>> getQuery()
      Returns the element query or null, if no query was applied before.
      org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMGraphHead readGraphHead(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
      Reads the graph data from the given result.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put writeGraphHead(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put put, org.gradoop.common.model.api.entities.GraphHead graphData)
      Adds all graph information to the given Put and returns it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.api.ElementHandler

        createTable, getPossibleRowKeys, getRowKey, isPreSplitRegions, isSpreadingByteUsed, readId, readLabel, readProperties, setPreSplitRegions, setSpreadingByteUsage, writeLabel, writeProperties, writeProperty
